title: Vacuum Cleaner Surface Detection (MIC)
description: Microphone-based surface detection for vacuum cleaners (Floor/Carpet/Air)
long_description: This project offers a framework to develop a surface detection model for recognizing different surfaces (Floor, Carpet, or Air) based on sound patterns generated by a vacuum cleaner.
